articles.description: Former Portsmouth, West Ham and Fulham star Papa Bouba Diop, known for scoring Senegal's famous goal to beat France in the 2002 World Cup, has reportedly passed away aged 42 after a battle with illness
articles.content:
Former Premier League star Papa Bouba Diop has passed away at the age of 42.
According to a number of reports, Bouba Diop had been suffering with a long-time illness, Charcot-Marie-Tooth disease.
